Harbin ls a great place to visit all year round.

Itks winter is ffom December to March and the weather is Very, very cold. But there is
alotto do. You can visit the world-famous Harbin Ice Festival, go skiing or even try ice
Swimming.

Summer is from July to August in Harbin. It is warm and a little wetb but not too
hot. Many people like to visit the city in summer and listen to all kinds of music at the
Harbin Summer Music Festival.

Harbin's spring is between April and June. The weather is usually warm in the day
but its cold at night, Its the time to enjoy Harbin's natural beauty. In this season, the
grass and trees tum green and you can See many colourful flowers.

Autumn is from September to November and the weather is usually cold and dry.
is a great time to go shopping at the outdoor markets or enjoy the light shows.
